name: Building From Scratch - Part 1
description: To cut the long story short, I’ve recently tried to build a neural network to control the cameras. However, it killed my computer, and it is acting up lately - bugs, freezes, and everything. Hit me up with some new parts. And make sure it's all new and untouched!
success_message: You actually brought them! I’ll grab a screwdriver and get to work. Here is your reward.

missions.message: Find Bundle of Wires in raid
Find Power Supply Unit in raid
Find Printed Circuit Board in raid

name: Building From Scratch - Part 2
success_message: Good work, my friend. We will use the data for the information we need. Here's your cut.
description: Listen up, I have set up the neural network to control the cameras. But there is a slight problem; I can't access them. I need you to obtain the Flash drive with the special info, it's planted in the red burned car's trunk, on the nearby bridge.

missions.message: Obtain the Flash drive with the special info on Customs
Hand over the Flash drive with with the special info

name: Building From Scratch - Part 3
success_message: Great, mercenary. This information opens up many possibilities for me. Here is your reward.
description: Greetings, mercenary. Currently I have two neural networks, one scans the faces on the cameras and compares them with the database, and the other one currently scans nothing. I'd like to stay well-informed about what is happening in the neighborhood to feel more at peace.

missions.message: Install a WI-FI camera on the medical container to watch the Health Resort
Install a WI-FI camera on the boat to watch the Pier
Install a WI-FI camera on the radio tower to watch the Shoreline territory
